reviews.review: Really good game, but skill based comp games are sometimes goofy. Overall good game.

(2020) Riot : released Valorant. Valve : released Trusted mode with group of cheaters.

This game has cleaned up its cheaters but god dam there are still alot, but alot less then release in 2012, i played in the early days but left at discuss of the plaque of cheaters, but now in 2020, the game has become a staple i would say the best fps game, you see battlefield has the motion sickness crap from wolfenstein and doom, but the half life engine seems to have cleaned that away, fortnite has clean interface but i don't like jumping out of a plane in a f%$^ing clown suit, so CS is the game i keep coming back to, you can uninstall the game but years later you find yourself back in the Counterstrike Virtual world, i call it a world because it has something so different to other FPS games, Value should just put a serious antcheat in the game that autokicks cheaters and ban computers to stop cheaters from simply buying a new steam account.. back in the early 2000s i use to go to internet cafes and player old counterstrike on lan, but if you get to good you can get a game.. my overall outlook on CSGO is it is truly remarkable i love this mother$#@!ing game. 10/10. Its not the community is salty, its just angry people letting off "steam" killing in a VR world but in the physical world your basically eating and being peaceful, and for a growing number of humans a "source" of income, back in 2000 if you where to tell me 2020 people can make more money playing video games then a trade i would say you are lying but times change, the world has changed, lets see where the future of mankind takes us.

This game is one of those games that you could say you're quitting and even go the length of deleting it. But for some odd reason you will come back to this game, whether it takes days or months. 10/10

kötü olan yanları:1- Valve anti hile sistemi (faceit&esea gibi modların kendi anti hile sistemleri var. Seçkin iseniz bu modlarda oynayın)2- Yetenek grubu (Ör: e sporcularla mahallenizdeki iyi oynayan abi ile aynı rank a sahip olabiliyor ayrım yok yani.)3- 64 tick serverlar (faceit&esea işi çözüyor)4- Türkiye'de sunucu olmadığı için fazla ping var (Türkiye de cs:go oyuncuları fazla olduğu halde??)5- Optimizasyon6- Sizi rakiplerden 1 puan öne geçirebilecek nadir de olsa bazı buglar olması (ör. duvar arkasında adamları görebilmeniz)İyi yanları1- Sadece bireysel olarak değil takım olarak oynamak da önemli2- Movement (bunny gibi)3- Uzun oynanış süresi (sonuçta online oyun)4- çeşitli modlar, atölye haritaları ve topluluk sunucuları5- Öğrenmesi kolay, Ustalaşması zor6- Oyun içinde ücretli öğeler kazanabiliyorsunuz
